title: Sore Thumb
description:
We're up against a wall here agent; there's little time and you're our only shot. We've recovered a disk image and desperately need to recover the password that was used to encrypt the drives in a ransomware attack. We know he had the password saved inside an image on his computer, but they have since removed all traces of it. Can you recover the password?

Download: https://drive.google.com/file/d/14XzxmVVV0FaEzXg0D5k3euf_5r6ptryh/view?usp=sharing
author: Alex McCoy (Tref)
